Package org.eclipse.mosaic.fed.application.ambassador.simulation.communication

Interface CommunicationModuleOwner

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractSimulationUnit, AgentUnit, ChargingStationUnit, ElectricVehicleUnit, RoadSideUnit, ServerUnit, TrafficLightGroupUnit, TrafficManagementCenterUnit, VehicleUnit
public interface CommunicationModuleOwner
Interface to be implemented by classes providing a communication module. Requires callback methods for the modules.

    • assembleCamMessage

      CamBuilder assembleCamMessage(CamBuilder camBuilder)
      Assembles a CamBuilder (Cooperative Awareness Message) using the given MessageRouting and the units' status information.
      Parameters:
      camBuilder - the routing for the Cam
      Returns:
      the assembled Cam, which can be sent
